cause.description:
SAVE ENERGY 1 BULB AT aTIME...... all you need to do is make the one light you use the most an energy saver lightbulb. its that simple, everyone should join.
1. We need to conserve energy
2. more money in pockets in long run.
3. less heat emmitted from energy saver products.
cause.name: S.E.1.B.A.T.
